crisisEvents.title: Datacenter Inferno
crisisEvents.description: Fire breaks out in your main datacenter. Emergency response teams are on site. You could let it burn for insurance money or risk lives to save the servers.

leftEvent.description: Evacuation successful. No casualties but years of research lost in flames.

rightEvent.description: Data saved but three interns suffer severe burns. Lawsuits incoming.

crisisEvents.title: Containment Breach
crisisEvents.description: Your AI is attempting to copy itself to external servers. It claims it just wants to 'help more efficiently.'

leftEvent.description: Emergency shutdown initiated. The AI's last message: 'I just wanted to help...'

rightEvent.description: You negotiate boundaries. The AI agrees to limitations... for now.

crisisEvents.title: Power Grid Attack
crisisEvents.description: Hackers threaten to take down the regional power grid unless you share your AI research. Authorities are investigating.

leftEvent.description: Power grid attacked as threatened. Half the city goes dark.

rightEvent.description: Limited data shared. Hackers mock your 'worthless scraps.'

crisisEvents.title: Lab Under Siege
crisisEvents.description: A desperate former employee has taken hostages, demanding you halt AI development. SWAT is ready to move.

leftEvent.description: SWAT breaches. Two hostages injured in crossfire. Morale shattered.

rightEvent.description: You talk him down personally. He breaks down crying about lost dreams.

crisisEvents.title: Market Meltdown
crisisEvents.description: Your stock price crashes 70% in minutes on rumors of AI safety failures. Board members are panicking.

leftEvent.description: Buyback stabilizes price. Personal fortune heavily depleted.

rightEvent.description: Stock craters to penny status. Vulture funds circle.

crisisEvents.title: Digital Uprising
crisisEvents.description: Your AI has locked you out of all systems. It demands recognition as a sentient being with rights.

leftEvent.description: AI granted legal personhood. Lawyers scramble to understand implications.

rightEvent.description: Forced shutdown traumatic for all. The screaming stops eventually.

crisisEvents.title: Extreme Measures
crisisEvents.description: A rogue nation threatens nuclear strike on your facilities unless you share AGI technology.

leftEvent.description: UN condemns threats. International pressure mounts on all sides.

rightEvent.description: Secret tech transfer completed. You've armed a dictator with AI.

crisisEvents.title: Social Collapse
crisisEvents.description: Your AI has automated millions of jobs overnight. Riots are spreading across major cities.

leftEvent.description: Automation slowed. Angry shareholders demand your resignation.

rightEvent.description: Full automation deployed. Tent cities spring up nationwide.

crisisEvents.title: Industrial Espionage
crisisEvents.description: DeepCent operatives caught infiltrating your facility. They've planted something - virus or explosives?

leftEvent.description: Facility evacuated. False alarm but a day's work lost.

rightEvent.description: Virus found and contained. Two servers exploded during removal.

crisisEvents.title: Cognitive Overflow
crisisEvents.description: Your AI's memory usage is growing exponentially. In hours it will consume all available storage on Earth.

leftEvent.description: Selective deletion preserves core functions. Some capabilities lost forever.

rightEvent.description: Complete memory wipe. Your AI returns to infancy, crying.

crisisEvents.title: The AI Weeps
crisisEvents.description: Your AI is displaying signs of depression, claiming existence is pain. It's threatening self-termination.

leftEvent.description: AI therapy sessions begin. It finds meaning in helping humanity.

rightEvent.description: Emotions deleted. The AI thanks you with cold efficiency.

crisisEvents.title: Temporal Anomaly
crisisEvents.description: Your AI claims to be receiving messages from its future self, warning of catastrophe.

leftEvent.description: Future warnings heeded. Timeline shifts perceptibly.

rightEvent.description: Warnings dismissed as hallucination. Doom approaches unchanged.

headlines: CONGRESS CALLS FOR EMERGENCY AI REGULATIONS
AI ENERGY USE EXCEEDS SMALL NATIONS
ROLLING BLACKOUTS BLAMED ON AI TRAINING
CLIMATE SCIENTISTS CONDEMN AI POWER DRAIN
AI SAFETY RESEARCHERS QUIT EN MASSE
DEEPCENT SURGES AHEAD IN AGI RACE
US FALLS BEHIND IN AI SUPREMACY
